data.description: Our vision is to transform how the world uses information to enrich life for all.Join an inclusive team passionate about one thing: using their expertise in the relentless pursuit of innovation for customers and partners. Because doing so can fuel the very innovation we are pursuing.Project Description:As an Intern - AI/DA Engineer, you will be part of the team to define, develop and improve the data traceability and analysis to support quality control and yield improvement through AI/automation solution. In this project, a process dashboard needs to be developed for data analytics and process optimization to improve overall quality.1) Learn Module/SSD assembly process includes Surface Mount Technology.2) Learn Printing, Pick & Place and Depanel process3) Learn the systems related to SMT processProject Assignment:Work on a project on developing automation/AI solution for SMT assembly process dashboard includes build details such as process parameter, material and durable.Deliverables:Able to understand Surface mount technology process and operation.Able to understand the Module/SSD product related informationAble to understand SMT-related systems such as SAP, BOM, Sigma and CTS.Develop a process dashboard successfully with minimum commonality study.Course: Data analytics related courses, i.e. Engineering, computer scienceSkillset Require: Python, C++Duration period: min 5 months (Semester Internship from January 2025 to May 2025)About Micron Technology, Inc.We are an industry leader in innovative memory and storage solutions transforming how the world uses information to enrich life for all.
